title: Drawing, "Adoration of the Shepherd", 1766
medium:
Pen and brown ink, brown wash, black chalk
Support: white laid paper, laid down on blue wove paper
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli (L. Supp. 2078a); Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee

Drawing, "Adoration of the Shepherd", 1766.
1766. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, black chalk
